value.name: NYC Pride bans police from parade
value.description: New York's Pride organizers announced uniformed NYPD officers are no longer welcome at the event. Pride is asking the police to stay at least one block away and acknowledge the “harm" law enforcement has done to the LGBTQ+ community.

video.name: NYC Pride bans police from parade

value.name: Grand Jury Will Not Indict Deputy Tu Tran for Police Killing of Joshua Johnson
value.description: A Texas grand jury decided not to indict Tu Tran, a Harris County Sheriff's Office (HCSO) deputy who shot and killed 35-year-old Black man Joshua Johnson on April 22, 2020. Tran had been wearing ...

value.name: Ret. NYPD detective on police reform
value.description: May 25th marks one year since George Floyd was murdered by former Minneapolis officer Derek Chauvin. The George Floyd Justice in Policing Act is currently stalled in the Senate undergoing bipartisan negotiations.

video.name: Ret. NYPD detective on police reform

value.name: Motorcyclist killed in Hartford crash
value.description: One person has died following a crash Saturday. It happened in the area of Garden and Liberty Streets around 5:30 p.m. Hartford Police Lt. Aaron Boisvert said the crash involved a 2002 Yamaha R6 motorcycle and a 2005 Acura TL.

value.name: Mayoral candidates call for transparency after report on domestic abuse allegations against Boston police commissioner
value.description: Campbell, in an appearance Sunday on MSNBC’s “The Week with Joshua Johnson,” said Boston has a “unique opportunity that we won’t necessarily get (again) anytime soon … to confront our own painful history of racism, segregation.”

value.name: ‘It was a cover up’: Mother of Ronald Greene on the police not releasing the video of her son’s death
